Reviews.Title: Nice, but measure before you assemble
Reviews.Author: D. Wood
Reviews.Content: Looks great and is very sturdy.  The adjustable shelf is attached by screws, and I realized after I put it in that my Wii was too tall to fit on the space I left.  So you should definitely buy it, but measure your components before you screw in the shelves.  It was pretty easy to fix though, so no worries.  It is designed to work with the big DLP Mitsubishi HDTVs, so don't buy this unless you are planning to use it with one of those.  It is set up to lock into the bottom of the TV and hold it down.

Reviews.Title: Great stand, but a bit expensive
Reviews.Author: s-kaf "Sam"
Reviews.Content: The stand arrived in a large box, because it's fully assembled (for the most part).  All you have to do is mount the horizontal bar (to support the adjustable shelf), screw in a couple of support brackets for the horizontal bar, and put the shelf on the bar.  That's it.  This took just a couple of minutes to do.  Overall, the fit and finish is excellent, and the build quality is excellent too.  However, it's rather expensive for what it's worth.  $400 dollars for a TV stand seems high (and $500 that some retailers are charging for it is simply ridiculous).Nevertheless, I'm very happy with it, especially since it's custom made for Mitsubishi DLP TVs; and was, for all intents and purposes, fully assembled (plus shipping was free...that could be upwards of $50-100 right there).  I highly recommend this as a good investment for the Mitsubishi 73" home theater TV's that this stand was designed for.  Besides, if you consider all the other stands out there, I found it rather difficult to find a good one that would even hold a TV of this size...most seem to be designed for 65" or less LCD's.  So this may be one of the few choices available for a TV 73" or larger.  Still a good pick, however.On a related note, I considered using one of the TV setup and installation services Amazon advertises...$100 for TV setup, and furniture assembly for an additional $99. I'm glad I didn't consider this, because there was really nothing to assemble furniture-wise, and I asked the driver about TV setup (I just purchased the TV today, because I wanted to have time to setup the stand for it first)...he said they typically unbox it, and place it on the stand for you (but no hookups, picture adjustments, etc).  If you're technically-inclined (there typically isn't much to hooking up AV equipment, unless you have an overly-complex theater setup), and can spend an hour or two adjusting the TV's picture to your liking, then you can save the $218 over using the hookup and furniture assembly service.

Reviews.Title: Nice stand for the 73" DLP
Reviews.Author: D. Obregon
Reviews.Content: Really, the only reason to buy this stand is to match up with the Mitsubishi 73" DLP. Otherwise, you can probably get just as nice or nicer a stand for the same money or less. The stand matches up with the TVs width perfectly though so it fits into the wall cutout perfectly. And it has enough space for the Cable Box, Receiver, PS3, Xbox, 360, Wii, and Center channel speaker.

Reviews.Title: perfect fit
Reviews.Author: spot
Reviews.Content: this stand was a perfect fit for my mitsubishi 73838 tv. the base of the tv actually slides into the stand and screw on so tv and stand become one piece. seems very sturdy, and looks awesome.

Reviews.Title: Looks good, but flimsy.
Reviews.Author: G. Young
Reviews.Content: I bought this stand for the Mitsubishi WD-73C9.  The back support is a single thin piece of wood.  When it arrived, it was already cracked.  Rather than go through the process of shipping it back, I just screwed another big piece of wood to it to add additional stability.  Stand looks great and the shelves hold my components fine.  I just think the product could have been better made to support the weight of the entire television in the back.

Reviews.Title: Best match for new 740 Series
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Buying a new Mitsubishi 73740 Series DLP?  This is the base to buy.  After looking at almost every base on the internet I came back to this one.  Don't be surprised or alarmed if one of the joints comes loose in shipping.  The base is heavy and made of particle board.  Get some fast setting wood putty and some good glue and put the joint back together.  In twenty four hours you will have a joint that is stronger than they day it was made.

Reviews.Title: mitsubishi mb-s73a
Reviews.Author: yamatodog
Reviews.Content: The factory base completes the whole look,as well as putting the picture at the right viewing height.The adjustable shelf is a great place to put the center speaker for your surround sound system too.

Reviews.Title: Perfect match for my new Mitsubishi 73" TV!
Reviews.Author: J KEVIN YZQUIERDO
Reviews.Content: This is a first class base! It not only fits the TV, it locks iit in with a bracket and screws! This makes for a very stable set up! Looks great too!

Reviews.Title: Broken item when I got it
Reviews.Author: Pita
Reviews.Content: When I got this item it is what I wanted but after a careful look it was broken on the bottom and I didn' want to send it back and waste time. So I decided to fix it myself with wood glue and nails. Good product just wish it wasn't broken.

Reviews.Title: STAND for 73 inch TELEVISION
Reviews.Author: PMcD
Reviews.Content: A perfect fit & made exactly for my MITSUBISHI. Well made, sturdy and looks good. This should last a very long time.

Reviews.Title: Stand value
Reviews.Author: machine "machine"
Reviews.Content: Receive the stand shipped via UPS.  I somewhat knew to expect it damaged because of reviews I have read about UPS items shipping that are heavy weight.  UPS will not let you open package and see if it is damage.  Package was in decent condition.  After opening up the lower shelf had a crack in it.  the TV shelf was pulled away from the side support on one side.  Might not be only UPS fault but the stand is made of pressed particle board.  I am not going to send back the stand. It is very hard to see damage when viewing.  The crack on lower shelf is hidden by a component and the top shelf connection to the side support is not to noticeable.  I will buy some black paint to and hide the damage.  As to the stand itself usage.  The center glass shelf support does not do a good at holding much weight.  I never did see any specs on weight support for the center shelf.  With my AVR and center speaker on the shelf it sag quite a bit.  I ended up cutting two 4 inch pieces of wood and sprayed paint them black.  I then put them under the glass shelf about a third of the way from the sides. No more center glass shelf sagging.  One of the reasons I bought this stand is that the center shelf was adjustable which is A1.  The WD73740 locks in just fine.  I got the stand a day later after the TV arrive so the TV was on the floor at first.  Really a good stand for usage but I wish it was more quality built to with stand damage in shipping.  The particle board just to cheap.  Really like the stand besides the mention quality.  Would buy again.  Looks great.  Especially like the adjustable center shelf.  Sold by Amazon thru Walts.

Reviews.Title: mits base
Reviews.Author: racerxxx
Reviews.Content: This base is very basic but it is built very well and securly holds the 73" mitsubishi in place. would have been nice if there would have been a back to it to cover all the cables and cords but you can come up with something at home easily enough.

Reviews.Title: I love my TC and Stand
Reviews.Author: Seth Wheatley
Reviews.Content: I received and setup the stand on my own. Yes, only me, thats' how easy it is (pre-assembled). The only thing that took my a bit more time was lifting the 73" on my own and sliding it in the area where it goes.Besides that, it's lovely and the right height. However I do find it tood costly for the materials is made off, but I can't complain.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT STAND FOR MY MITSUBISHI 73 INCH HDTV
Reviews.Author: Honest Abe
Reviews.Content: The stand arrived exactly as scheduled, along with my new Mitsu WD-73738 HDTV, on July 22, 2010.  I asked the men handling the delivery to bring in the stand first, which they did.  Upon unboxing the stand I found all parts required for installing the glass middle shelf and fastening the set to the stand were present.  The stand itself was in perfect condition, with no chips, scrapes or scratches. Installing the middle glass shelf and fastening the set to the stand was very simple and straightforward.  I especially like the way the top shelf of the stand is constructed, allowing the base of the TV to kind of "nest" in the top shelf.  That feature, plus the bracket which fastens the set to the stand in back makes for a very secure union of the two pieces.  The glass shelf can be installed at any one of five different heights, thereby giving you a good deal of flexibility as to its positioning.  This shelf is sturdy enough to hold both my DirecTV receiver and my new Panasonic BluRay player, as well as the center speaker of my surround sound system.  All in all, I feel the two units together present a very pleasing unified appearance and I'm really not sure how this stand is inferior to the other 73 inch stand which Amazon sells for an additional $100.00.  I am very pleased with this stand.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I expected
Reviews.Author: Robert Perrin
Reviews.Content: Looks great. a little pricey for just a TV stand but you pay for convenience.  No problems with shipping and no damage. Very happy with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great looking stand!
Reviews.Author: bdhart
Reviews.Content: I bought this stand from a seller for $350 shipped. It was delivered in perfect condition.The stand looks great and is a perfect match for the 73837. The TV fits perfectly into the base and is easy to assemble.The brace for the glass shelf could be stronger, but it is a long span. The glass shelf sags a little bit with a receiver, center channel speaker and a Blu Ray player sitting on it. An adjustable vertical brace under the glass shelf would have been a nice addition.I don't think the retail price of $499 for this stand is justified. There just isn't that much to this stand for that price. $350 shipped is about the highest I would go for this stand.Overall, this a sturdy stand, looks great and I am very satisfied with it.

Reviews.Title: Mitsubishi matching TV stand for 73" DLP TV
Reviews.Author: V. Bhatia
Reviews.Content: Looks nice. Amazon had the best price. Was easy to assemble. A perfect match for the Mitsubishi 73" DLP TV.

Reviews.Title: Amazon return process
Reviews.Author: MEB
Reviews.Content: I recieved the first base unit and discovered the top shelf particle board was broken on the left side, processed a return which was very easy and painless. Unfortunately when the replacement base unit was received it had a similar broken top shelf. Now processing the return has been difficult as the Amazon return system will not let me complete the return process and there is not a number to call or an email address to understand why. I have tried to process a return for 3 days now without success. Now the TV has arrived (also ordered through Amazon) and I do not have a TV Base Unit to put it on and I am unable to order a replacement unit yet!!!.

Reviews.Title: Fair quality
Reviews.Author: Ben J. Pargo
Reviews.Content: Product arrived damaged, it is made of pressed wood and end support broken and seperated from top shelf., it was either send it back and wait for a replacement or repair the one I had. I choose to repair my unit by inserting a long screw thru the shelf and side support. Because of the damage during packing or shipping I rate the product three stars out of five.

Reviews.Title: Fits other Mitsubishi Models 73737, 73738, 73838
Reviews.Author: lazlong
Reviews.Content: First of all, I had to give this a star rating even though I don't yet own it.I just want everyone to know that the Mitsubishi TV website has pdf spec sheets which list which matching stand fits the TV. It took me a while to figure it out, but I finally got it sorted out.I'm about to buy a WD-73738, and it lists this stand as the matching base. I also checked the WD-73838, WD-73737 which also list this stand as the matching base. So if you're trying to determine the correct base, check out the Mitsubishi TV website, find your model, then click on "Product Specs", then "Detailed Specs", then "Spec Sheet". Scroll down and check the details.OK, now I've mounted my 73738 on this stand, and it fits perfectly.The support for the glass shelf is a padded piece of steel square tubing, and the rear supports are pinned in place. I find the shelf PLENTY sturdy.Also, I went to the store to get some felt gliders for this stand. When I flipped it on it's front to install them, I found that it already has them.Fits my TV perfectly and looks good.Some way to organize cables would be nice, but a few sticky-backs and Ty-Wraps do the job just fine.

Reviews.Title: Very pricey
Reviews.Author: Sandra D. Beeman "Sandra in PA"
Reviews.Content: There is absolutely nothing special about this stand but it is designed for the 73" HD TV I just purchased andthe base of the TV just slides into the top grooves.  TV is sturdy on the stand and the stand slides easilyon the floor.  One glass shelf for the components and no frills.  I bought it because someone else I know saidit worked so well for this particular TV but on face value, it is ordinary.

Reviews.Title: Take the good with the bad
Reviews.Author: Linda
Reviews.Content: Here's the "good":  the base was designed for the TV and looks good with it, and it arrived immediately before the TV arrived.Here's the "bad":  the base sustained some damage during shipping; not enough to be worth shipping it back and waiting for a replacement, and not enough to compromise the strength of the base.  I think the base is overpriced considering it is made of particle board and one piece of glass.  It needs some panels on the back to hide all the wires, and ideally some doors on the front to protect components from dust accumulation.Summary:  I opted to bite the price bullet to avoid the necessary search to find a TV base that was the right size and looked good with the TV.  Obviously I didn't count on shipping damage and somewhat cheap materials of construction, but I still like the base.  I rolled the dice and I guess I think I almost broke even.

Reviews.Title: WORST packaging and delivery by AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Sung Chung
Reviews.Content: I bought a Mitsubishi television and bought this stand to match.  It was delivered twice to our home and both times the wood was cracked.  This is the worst experience I ever had with Amazon.  The amount of time spent packing and unpacking and boxing and un-boxing, calling Amazon, having someone at home for delivery and pick-up was immensely annoying and painful.  I wasted so much time on this product that it cost me the equivalent of buying two of these at full price at a local store.  DO NOT BUY this from Amazon. I have had much better luck with other products, but large items seems to come always damaged.
